I dont really mind the subs but I like it better without seence english is one of the languages I have been brought up with. A advantege of parents from diffrent nations =) Cant wait so I willgrab this now anyway =) So thanx for the up and the response on my previouse comment. Cheers mate

NLUPPER: if you have access to the original (before the subs were hardcoded), or know someone else who does, we would love to see that uploaded.  

It lets us english watch without a language we can't understand scrolling across the bottom.  

Also allows other languages a clean copy to add their own subs.

Thanks!

This is truely a craptastic piece of garbage. 

V=4
A=3

No movie rating as I couldent stand the HORRIBLE video/audio quality past about 5 mins. If this is a RIP of anything it's a RIP of some guys HD videocam pointed at his SD Mono TV screen. I've seen better quality from an HD CAM scan in a theater. The only way I can see this ended up being 4GB is some dude let his cam and capture software run in HD Mode. But unfortunately a 1080i scan of crap is still CRAP. 

I truly cannot believe anyone would bother to try and imply this is in any way even close to DVD quality. And I cannot believe someone would try to make an HD scan from what is very obviously a SD Mono format. 

Don't bother with this, wait for the pre-release Blu-Ray scans in a month or so.
